translations: n．无神论者：不相信神或神祇存在的人。
· Atheists do not believe in the existence of a higher power.
无神论者不相信有更高的力量存在。

sentences.sentence: Atheists do not believe in God.
Atheists deny the existence of God.
sentences.translation: 无神论者否定上帝的存在。

sentences.sentence: Atheists think science has the answers.
sentences.translation: 无神论者认为科学有答案。
